pullrequest.title: [A-3] Dockerfile and supporting scripts for building ign-gazebo

content.raw:
1. I probably didn’t run into this because I set the install prefix to `/usr` in the build\_ign\_gazebo.sh script \(because it’s in a container and unlikely to pollute\)
2. I haven't been running with GUI, which probably requires something like the `rocker` or Shane’s setup.

I'll change 1 so that it goes in `/usr/local`, which is probably more appropriate, and won’t screw anything up if you run it outside the container and update the \(container's\) bashrc accordingly.
